column5: My pappa and I went out for a quick morning fish today on Lake Scugog. From shore i tried some of my snakes i bought over the winter. Well as you can see they worked, snaped a few pictures of the fish coming towards me.The bass was 2.8lbsThis one was 2.7lbsAs said in the winter months i know these will work and they do. I will have many more fish on this bait later this season.(Snake Only Fish)Black Snake (4.8lbs)Black SnakeAnother little bassMy first ever PikeBrown Snake (22" long)Brown Snake (2.11lbs)Brown Snake (2.5lbs)Brown Snake (2.0lbs)Brown Snake (1.15lbs)That was all for this year on my new lures and as i said earlier in the year, this bait would produce fish and indeed it did. If will hopefully send in another order during the winter months and get ready for another exciting summer of topwater snake fishing!
Good job man.  Now you can fish your snake with even more confidence. Cheers.
Nice bass Mike, great start to your holidays.
lately i've been working my snake for lady fish aka land mermaids  nice catch

~~Great post Mike well done, I'll have to some of those Snakes, my Bass bait of choice is a Swamp Rat. Haven't got out yet had a sponcer Golf Tourney today, me and my boss came in 2nd, DRAT. Keep up the good work keep camera and tape measure handy
Nice job Mike.  Glad to see those worked for you.
now im really itching! I'll be pounding the Bog's flats tommorow morning
How would i get my hands on one of these?
http://www.bassprofessor.com/elite/originalfishingsnake.php  They took about 3 weeks to get to me as they are in the united states, so i fish for 20minutes with them and BAM! Best topwater lure yet!
not trying to hijack your thread or anything but i think u might wanna try this lure out its worked wonders for me http://www.berkley-fishing.com/prod.php?k=...-AL%20(1108841)   P.S Nice Bass
Great pictures!!!  Some nice Bass there, congrats!  Maureen
Gotta love it when a new lure produces. Any plastic with a wiggle will catch fish!
awesome to hear that the snake works!  Was wondering how they would make out!  Cheers!
I have that exact same lure in the frog pattern, has not even seen water. I will try it out thanks.
